description: Surrogate primary key for this record.
Identifier of the work order associated with this record.
Identifier of the asset on which the work is to be performed.
Reference to the maintenance procedure to be executed for the asset.
Reference to the scheduling record governing when this work should occur.
Identifier for the asset’s group/classification; used for reporting and scheduling.
Coded status of this work assignment (e.g., planned, in progress, completed); see status lookup.
Priority derived from the asset’s criticality for scheduling and dispatching.
Priority assigned to the procedure, influencing ordering and response.
System-calculated priority combining factors such as asset and procedure priorities.
Timestamp when this assignment was created in the system.
Planned date/time the work is scheduled to occur.
Most recent date/time this procedure was previously performed on the asset.
Required completion date/time or due-by for the work.
Actual start date/time when work began.
Actual completion date/time for the work.
Date/time the assignment was cancelled, if applicable.
Identifier of the asset’s location/site when the work was raised.
Flag indicating whether the work is covered by warranty (1=yes, 0=no).
Indicates the task was performed while the asset remained in operation.
Indicates the task required the asset to be shut down.
Reason code for initiating or modifying the work (e.g., preventive, failure, compliance).
Free-text notes explaining scheduling delays or hold-ups.
Date/time of the most recent amendment to this record.
User ID that performed the last amendment.
Likely reference to a combined schedule-asset-procedure record used for planning; confirm with SME.
Flag to allocate any remaining planned parts from prior related work; confirm with SME.
Flag to allocate remaining miscellaneous costs from prior related work; confirm with SME.
Flag to allocate remaining planned resources or labor from prior related work; confirm with SME.
System timestamp of the latest change to this record.
Optional settings or serialized flags affecting this assignment; likely system-controlled; confirm with SME.
Building identifier where the asset or work is located.
Floor within the building; facility-level location detail.
Room or space identifier within the facility.
Flag indicating this is the primary asset-procedure association for the work order.
Customer or internal account to be charged for the work.
Billing or chargeback reference number associated with this work.
Percentage of parts cost allocated to this assignment or customer.
Percentage of labor cost allocated to this assignment or customer.
Percentage of miscellaneous cost allocated to this assignment or customer.
Parts cost amount attributable to this assignment.
Labor cost amount attributable to this assignment.
Miscellaneous cost amount attributable to this assignment.
Timestamp of the last modification performed by a user (as opposed to automated updates).
Reference to proof-of-service or scheduling evidence (e.g., document ID, attachment); likely used for compliance; confirm with SME.
Flag indicating proof-of-service is required or has been captured; confirm with SME.
User ID that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created by a user.
User ID that last modified the record.
Timestamp when the record was last modified by a user.
